Package es.unex.cum.si.practica.model.phenotype

Class Schedule

java.lang.Object
es.unex.cum.si.practica.model.phenotype.Schedule
public class Schedule extends Object
The class Schedule stores the classes of a schedule. This is a translation of the chromosome to a genotype, so it can be easily evaluated.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Schedule(int numOfClasses)
    Constructs a schedule with a specified number of classes.
    Schedule(Schedule cloneable)
    Constructs a schedule by cloning another schedule.

    • parseChromosome

      public void parseChromosome(Individual individual)
      Translates the chromosome of an individual to a schedule.
      Parameters:
      individual - The individual with a chromosome to parse.

    • getClasses

      public Class[] getClasses()
      Gets the array of classes representing the schedule.
      Returns:
      The array of classes.

    • calcConflicts

      public int calcConflicts()
      Calculates the number of conflicts in the schedule.
      Returns:
      The number of conflicts.

    • calcPenalties

      public int calcPenalties()
      Calculates the quality of the schedule based on: - The number of days with more than 3 classes. - The number of classes that are not consecutive. - The number of classes that are not in the first period of the morning or the first period of the afternoon.
      Returns:
      The quality score of the schedule.
